channel.title: Infoes on debidong's site
channel.description: Recent content in Infoes on debidong's site

item.title: Intro
item.author: debidong@foxmail.com (debidong)
item.description: Welcome This is debidong’s site, maintained by the owner of this GitHub account. debidong posts his thoughts and possibly not-so-technical blogs here (as his technical expertise is limited). debidong a student majoring in information security. He is interested in cybersecurity and web development. He mainly uses Python and JavaScript. For more info about this guy, please go to About in the menu bar. (It is really amusing to write these in the third person :P)

item.title: About
item.author: debidong@foxmail.com (debidong)
item.description: Hi there My name is Yang Bowen. I’m pursuing my undergraduate studies in the field of information security Harbin Engineering University. I’m interested in Web development (mainly backend), as well as cybersecurity & CTF competitions (web & crypto). In terms of web development technologies, I’ve gained knowledge and hands-on experience with Python and the Django framework, as well as Redis and MySQL. I’ve also delved into the principles and usage of JavaScript and the Vue.
